attributes.action: Remove universal credits 2 child limit help families during the COVID19 pandemic
attributes.additional_details:
Children will be missing out on free school meals.
Supermarkets are suffering from the impact of panic buying meaning familys may have to pay out higher prices for products they need to support their families.
Children are already suffering please do something to prevent any more hardship for these families of the lower and working class.
attributes.background: Children and suffering in poverty in the uk, familys are having to attend food banks to feed their children. During this crisis we ask that Boris Johnson removes the 2 child limit to protect familys as our country goes through this crash and prevent more hardship on top of the impact of the COVID19.
